00009 extern "C" const char* ADDCALL libsass_get_version() {

00013 union Sass_Value* custom_function(const union Sass_Value* s_args, Sass_Function_Entry cb, struct Sass_Options* opts)
00014 {
00015   // get the cookie from function descriptor
00016   void* cookie = sass_function_get_cookie(cb);
00017   // we actually abuse the void* to store an "int"
00018   return sass_make_number((intptr_t)cookie, "px");
00019 }
00020 
00021 extern "C" Sass_Function_List ADDCALL libsass_load_functions()
00022 {
00023   // allocate a custom function caller
00024   Sass_Function_Entry c_func =
00025     sass_make_function("foo()", custom_function, (void*)42);
00026   // create list of all custom functions
00027   Sass_Function_List fn_list = sass_make_function_list(1);
00028   // put the only function in this plugin to the list
00029   sass_function_set_list_entry(fn_list, 0, c_func);
00030   // return the list
00031   return fn_list;
00032 }
00033 
00034 Sass_Import_List custom_importer(const char* cur_path, Sass_Importer_Entry cb, struct Sass_Compiler* comp)
00035 {
00036   // get the cookie from importer descriptor
00037   void* cookie = sass_importer_get_cookie(cb);
00038   // create a list to hold our import entries
00039   Sass_Import_List incs = sass_make_import_list(1);
00040   // create our only import entry (route path back)
00041   incs[0] = sass_make_import_entry(cur_path, 0, 0);
00042   // return imports
00043   return incs;
00044 }
00045 
00046 extern "C" Sass_Importer_List ADDCALL libsass_load_importers()
00047 {
00048   // allocate a custom function caller
00049   Sass_Importer_Entry c_imp =
00050     sass_make_importer(custom_importer, - 99, (void*)42);
00051   // create list of all custom functions
00052   Sass_Importer_List imp_list = sass_make_importer_list(1);
00053   // put the only function in this plugin to the list
00054   sass_importer_set_list_entry(imp_list, 0, c_imp);
00055   // return the list
00056   return imp_list;
00057 }
